abstract: Cambodian tribunal reinstates genocide hearings against Khmer Rouge's surviving senior leaders, Khieu Samphan and Nuon Chea.
lead_paragraph: A tribunal restarted genocide hearings on Thursday against the Khmer Rouge’s most senior surviving leaders, with the first witness being called to testify against them.
snippet: A tribunal restarted genocide hearings on Thursday against the Khmer Rouge’s most senior surviving leaders, with the first witness being called to testify against them.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
